Świetne połączenie gry logicznej z bardzo oryginalną fabułą. Historia jest naprawdę przemyślana, zaskakująca i opowiedziana z humorem. Oprawa graficzno dźwiękowa bardzo miła, na szczególne uznanie zasługują głosy aktorów.  Zagadki nie są szczególnie trudne ale dostarczają satysfakcji z rozwiązania. Zostało dodane kilka elementów których nie było w pierszej części więc nie jest nudno.

Ogólnie uważam tą grę za jedną z najlepszych w jakie grałem.
Nie próbowałem (jeszcze) MP.

Polecam

So, I never played Portal or Portal 2 before, this holiday sale though got me to buy the bundle and figured I mind as well as see what the hype is all about.

In the first one, I had a few chuckles, and the puzzles were fairly straightforward.  The ending level was incredibly long and I found myself getting more annoyed with it then enjoying it.  Overall, it was a fun little game, but didn't snag me.

The next day, I figured I'd beat Portal 2 just to say I finished the series before saying I didn't really enjoy it.  At first, I was expecting more of the same, and was given more of the same.  However after what I thought was the end to a fairly decent puzzle game, the suprise happened.  I don't want to go into spoilers but after the fall, it really got interesting.  I loved the lore and backstory and explaination given there, but still found the puzzles a bit easy, and at times, very tedious.  When the third gel was added, the climb back up really was the first time I got frusterated by the puzzles, as it seemed very unclear how to proceed.  Solving those final puzzles of that section were very rewarding, and that and the story got me looking forward to the final battle.  The puzzles when back in the modern factory were far more annoying than hard in some places, and challenging in others.  The final battle was interesting.

Overall, as a Portal newb, I was fairly glad that I beat both games without looking anything up, reading any guides, or resorting to outside help.  That experience left me with a sense of satisfaction, and with the reasonable length of the two games, that satisfaction of time well spent, and the fun of the stroyline, left me having to say, I found these games very enjoyable.

So, for someone who went into the series knowing nothing but memes, expecting nothing but memes, and going into it already deciding it wasn't a series for me, I was pleasently suprised.  For anyone else expecting the same, I recommend you give it a try, you'll find yourself changing your mind.

Peki nedir bu PORTAL 2 ?

Portal 2 FPS Tabanlı tek veya çok oyunculu bir Puzzle oyunudur.
İçerisinde sizi bekleyen alt yazılarda kendine özgü Türkçe dil paketi mevcuttur. [internetten yama araştırmaya gerek yok :P Gabe'N abimiz bizide düşünürmüş ^^ Valve bu kardeş yapıyo adamlar]
Ben bu oyunu oynarken kendime bir söz vermiştim internetten bakmamak konusunda. Adamlar matematiğin oyununu yapmışlar bildiğin [matematiğim zayıf] her neyse oyunu 8 saat oynadım ve sonunda bitirdim. [4. saatte oyun kesin bitti diyordum yeni başlıyormuş] Her neyse şimdi oyun bitti ee ne oldu ?? Diğer biten oyunlar gibi kaldırıp atmak veya silmek mi gerek ? Hayır oyunumuz bitmedi. Oyunumuzda [tek kişilikte] ilerlerken rastladığımız 2 robotu şimdi online olarak oynayabiliyoruz. Oyunumuzun devamı CO-OP olarak ilerliyor. Bana kalırsa tek oyunculuyu bitirmeden CO-OP a girmeyin arkadaşınızla. Her neyse CO-OP da ayrı bir güzel baştan sona farklı haritalar. Farklı zeka oyunları.. Haydii noldu 10 saatte onu oynadın bitti CO-OP :( Ne yapıcaksın şimdi Atölye haritalarımız var fıstık gibi birbirinden güzel adamlarda ne harita yapıyo be ! dedirtecek tarzdan haritalar bunlar. Ortalama bu oyun sizi bi 50-60 Saat götürür. Steama 20 tl yüklediniz 12 TL ye CS:GO mu aldınız ? 8 TL Paranız mı arttı ? İşte bu oyun tam size göre! Bırakın Portal 1 i Portal 1 de efsanedir ha ona lafım yok ama. 2 Çıkmışken 1 i oynamanızı pek önermem yani eğer grafiklere önem veriyorsanız.. Zaten Portal 1 i 15 saat falan oynayıp bitirdikten sonra Portal 2 sıkar biraz off yinemi [ portal 2 dede tekrar portal silahını alıp öğretiyo baştan her şeyi zaten devamı gibi düşünmeyin] Eğer oda oyunlarını seviyorsanız kesinlikle alın. Oda oyunlarından kastım şu hani bi odada kilitli kalırsınız kapı anahtarı lavabodadır lavaboda kitlidir anahtarın yerini öğrenmek için bilgisayara geçersiniz bilgisayar şifrelidir şifreyi çözersiniz anahtarın yerini bilgisayardan bulursunuz anahtarı alırsınız vs. vs.

+ Yönleri :
Yapımcısı Valve.
Oyun içi easter eggler. [ gizli yerler ]
Oyun içi karakterler arası iletişim.
CO-OP Otomatik konuşma sistemi.
Mekanikler.
Grafik.
Ses.
Tasarım.
Zeka oyunları. [ HİÇ KİMSENİN AKLINA GELMEYECEK TÜRDEN ! ]
Turret sesleri [ ULAN NE GÜZEL KONUŞUYOLAR IM DİFFERENT DİYİŞİ VAR  SESİNE AŞIK OLURSUN ]

- Yönleri :
Neden oyunu deneyip burayı sen doldurmuyorsun ?!

When I had a chance to play Portal 2 at my friend's house one day, I knew this would have to be one of the first games I buy on Steam. Many puzzle games have the fault of being too difficult, unoriginal, and ultimately having low replayablility because puzzles you've already figured out once are no fun. This game throws all those faults in the garbage. While the game was very difficult, and I have been stuck on the same level for an hour once or twice, I never felt like the game was unbeatable, and I enjoyed it very much. The portal gun is also one of the most original game items I have ever encountered, and I never get tired of using it. Lastly, it is one of the most replayable puzzle games yet. For one, the co-op mode is very fun, and while even if you already beat it once, the experience can be completely different depending on who you play with, so it's always fun to play it with someone new. There's also the feature of community test chambers made by you, the players. Now you have to download the chambers, so depending on what computer you're playing it on, you can't just play community test chambers until you die, but it's always fun to see what other people come up with.

Für mich eines der besten Spiele. Alleine die Story macht das Spiel spielenswert. Oben drauf kommen die Koop-Missionen in denen gemeinsames Knobeln angesagt ist. Hat man sich die Zeit genommen die Story und die Koop-Missionen durchzuspielen wartet ein prallgefüllter Workshop auf dich (euch). Auch das ist ein Grund warum ich das Spiel immer mal wieder spiele.

Die Steuerung ist mit beiden Hardwaretypen (Tastatur+Maus & Kontroller) möglich. Die Umsetzung hierfür ist sehr gut gelungen wodurch es schon fast schwer fällt zu wählen. Letztlich entscheidet das eigene Empfinden darüber.

Klare Kaufempfehlung!

From my experience I can say you can completely fall in love with this game even without playing the first one. The story is fully enjoyable, with very funny parts, as well as the multiplayer mode.

But for 3,79€ Portal completes what Portal 2 has, so I recommend to buy the bundle while the sale lasts

One of my all-time favourite games

Portal 2 honra o seu nome, esse segundo game ficou espetacular, valve caprichou na elaboração. É um jogo que te prende de um jeito, não tem como explicar, ele vem com vários testes diferentes e sempre com o seu humor que faz você gostar demais dos personagens, tanto os mocinhos, quanto os vilões, uma história misteriosa e com surpresas inesperáveis. O gráfico bonito, jogabilidade simples e muito boa, e a trilha sonora engraçada demais combinando 100% com o jogo. Na minha opinião o único contra que eu tive em relação a ele foi que a legenda do meu jogo funcionava quando queria, as vezes aparecia, as vezes não, não sei se foi bug apenas no meu jogo ou a valve pecou nesse aspecto, mas deu para entender a história direitinho e se divertir com ela normalmente.

História 10/10
Gráfico 8,5/10
Trilha Sonora 10/10
Jogabilidade 9/10
An improvement to the first game. Defenatly recommended
